Events.RelatedDescription: Opened issue "Device Orientation from Android Options" (#3383) at xamarin/xamarin-android
Events.RelatedBody:
Hi,

Please provide Device Orientation from the Android Options screen just like the Xamarin iOS so developer will select the supported orientation instead of writing it in the MainActivity


Thanks,
Jassim

Events.RelatedDescription: Opened issue "Xamarin.Android x86 unknown crash when running under Azure macOS Hosted Agent" (#3382) at xamarin/xamarin-android
Events.RelatedBody:
### Steps to Reproduce

1. On a macOS Hosted Agent, run [this file](https://github.com/unoplatform/uno/blob/90d55a7f3c555c07182fdf450c2850961889597c/build/android-uitest-run.sh) at this commit.
2. The application will run tests based on Xamarin.UITest in a simulator

I have not been able to repro in another setup, could be timing related.

### Expected Behavior
The Xamarin.UITests end successfully.

### Actual Behavior
The app crashes with the following logs:

```
07-23 13:35:39.715  5588  5588 E mono-rt : /proc/self/maps:
07-23 13:35:39.715  5588  5588 E mono-rt : 12c00000-13980000 rw-p 00000000 00:05 14281                              /dev/ashmem/dalvik-main space (region space) (deleted)
07-23 13:35:39.715  5588  5588 E mono-rt : 13980000-13a00000 ---p 00d80000 00:05 14281                              /dev/ashmem/dalvik-main space (region space) (deleted)
07-23 13:35:39.716  5588  5588 E mono-rt : 13a00000-13a40000 rw-p 00e00000 00:05 14281                              /dev/ashmem/dalvik-main space (region space) (deleted)
07-23 13:35:39.716  5588  5588 E mono-rt : 13a40000-13a80000 ---p 00e40000 00:05 14281                              /dev/ashmem/dalvik-main space (region space) (deleted)
07-23 13:35:39.716  5588  5588 E mono-rt : 13a80000-13b40000 rw-p 00e80000 00:05 14281                              /dev/ashmem/dalvik-main space (region space) (deleted)
07-23 13:35:39.716  5588  5588 E mono-rt : 13b40000-13bc0000 ---p 00f40000 00:05 14281                              /dev/ashmem/dalvik-main space (region space) (deleted)
07-23 13:35:39.716  5588  5588 E mono-rt : 13bc0000-2ac00000 rw-p 00fc0000 00:05 14281                              /dev/ashmem/dalvik-main space (region space) (deleted)
07-23 13:35:39.716  5588  5588 E mono-rt : 57f4d000-57f52000 r-xp 00000000 fc:00 2464                               /system/bin/app_process32
07-23 13:35:39.716  5588  5588 E mono-rt : 57f52000-57f53000 r--p 00004000 fc:00 2464                               /system/bin/app_process32
07-23 13:35:39.716  5588  5588 E mono-rt : 57f53000-57f54000 rw-p 00000000 00:00 0 
07-23 13:35:39.716  5588  5588 E mono-rt : 70762000-70987000 rw-p 00000000 fc:01 14669                              /data/dalvik-cache/x86/system@framework@boot.art
07-23 13:35:39.716  5588  5588 E mono-rt : 70987000-7099d000 r--p 00225000 fc:01 14669                              /data/dalvik-cache/x86/system@framework@boot.art
07-23 13:35:39.716  5588  5588 E mono-rt : 7099d000-70a94000 rw-p 00000000 fc:01 14672                              /data/dalvik-cache/x86/system@framework@boot-core-libart.art
07-23 13:35:39.716  5588  5588 E mono-rt : 70a94000-70aa6000 r--p 000f7000 fc:01 14672                              /data/dalvik-cache/x86/system@framework@boot-core-libart.art
07-23 13:35:39.716  5588  5588 E mono-rt : 70aa6000-70ad7000 rw-p 00000000 fc:01 14675                              /data/dalvik-cache/x86/system@framework@boot-conscrypt.art
07-23 13:35:39.716  5588  5588 E mono-rt : 70ad7000-70ada000 r--p 00031000 fc:01 14675                              /data/dalvik-cache/x86/system@framework@boot-conscrypt.art
07-23 13:35:39.716  5588  5588 E mono-rt : 70ada000-70b07000 rw-p 00000000 fc:01 14678                              /data/dalvik-cache/x86/system@framework@boot-okhttp.art
07-23 13:35:39.716  5588  5588 E mono-rt : 70b07000-70b0a000 r--p 0002d000 fc:01 14678                              /data/dalvik-cache/x86/system@framework@boot-okhttp.art
07-23 13:35:39.717  5588  5588 E mono-rt : 70b0a000-70b60000 rw-p 00000000 fc:01 14681                              /data/dalvik-cache/x86/system@framework@boot-bouncycastle.art
07-23 13:35:39.717  5588  5588 E mono-rt : 70b60000-70b67000 r--p 00056000 fc:01 14681                              /data/dalvik-cache/x86/system@framework@boot-bouncycastle.art
07-23 13:35:39.720  5588  5588 E mono-rt : 70b67000-70bbc000 rw-p 00000000 fc:01 14684                              /data/dalvik-cache/x86/system@framework@boot-apache-xml.art
07-23 13:35:39.721  5588  5588 E mono-rt : 70bbc000-70bc3000 r--p 00055000 fc:01 14684                              /data/dalvik-cache/x86/system@framework@boot-apache-xml.art

```

### Version Information
- Default Xamarin.Android version for current hosted agents (VS 16.1)
- Also tested with `Xamarin.Android.Sdk-OSS-9.4.0.59_d16-2_6d9b105.pkg` from [Jenkins](https://jenkins.mono-project.com/view/Xamarin.Android/job/xamarin-android-d16-2/).

### Log File
[android-device-log (14).txt](https://github.com/xamarin/xamarin-android/files/3423195/android-device-log.14.txt)

Events.RelatedDescription: Closed issue "Page TitleAlignment Property" (#6960) at xamarin/Xamarin.Forms
Events.RelatedBody:
Hi,

Please add TitleAlignment to the ContentPage which will Have the following values:

- Right
- Left
- Center

This will allow users to align the title without having to write custom render or use cusom layout, e.g. Grids.


Thanks,
[Jassim](https://www.jassimrahma.net)

Events.RelatedDescription: Opened issue "[Bug] Nullreference exception when Master.IconImageSource not set" (#6958) at xamarin/Xamarin.Forms
Events.RelatedBody:
<!-- Bug report best practices: https://github.com/xamarin/Xamarin.Forms/wiki/Submitting-Issues -->

### Description
After upgrading the Xamarin Forms libraries from 3.4 to 4.1, my app in Android crashes with a nullreference exception. This happens when I set a MasterDetailPage as the MainPage after the user went through a login screen.

Investigation gave me the following stacktrace in the android device log:
System.NullReferenceException: Object reference not set to an instance of an object.  
	at Xamarin.Forms.Platform.Android.Platform.UpdateMasterDetailToggle (System.Boolean update) [0x00018] in D:\a\1\s\Xamarin.Forms.Platform.Android\Platform.cs:585   
	at Xamarin.Forms.Platform.Android.Platform.UpdateActionBar () [0x000b6] in D:\a\1\s\Xamarin.Forms.Platform.Android\Platform.cs:548   at Xamarin.Forms.Platform.Android.Platform.SetPage (Xamarin.Forms.Page newRoot) [0x000ad] in D:\a\1\s\Xamarin.Forms.Platform.Android\Platform.cs:502   
	at Xamarin.Forms.Platform.Android.FormsApplicationActivity.InternalSetPage (Xamarin.Forms.Page page) [0x0001a] in D:\a\1\s\Xamarin.Forms.Platform.Android\FormsApplicationActivity.cs:234   
	at Xamarin.Forms.Platform.Android.FormsApplicationActivity.AppOnPropertyChanged (System.Object sender, System.ComponentModel.PropertyChangedEventArgs args) [0x00012] in D:\a\1\s\Xamarin.Forms.Platform.Android\FormsApplicationActivity.cs:222   
	at Xamarin.Forms.BindableObject.OnPropertyChanged (System.String propertyName) [0x00000] in D:\a\1\s\Xamarin.Forms.Core\BindableObject.cs:211   
	at Xamarin.Forms.Element.OnPropertyChanged (System.String propertyName) [0x00000] in D:\a\1\s\Xamarin.Forms.Core\Element.cs:359   at Xamarin.Forms.Application.set_MainPage (Xamarin.Forms.Page value) [0x0008b] in D:\a\1\s\Xamarin.Forms.Core\Application.cs:87   
	at Bullseye.App.<ShowMainPage>b__10_0 () [0x00007] in D:\irex\irexOne\NETStandard_Test\Bullseye\Bullseye\Bullseye\App.cs:137   
	at Java.Lang.Thread+RunnableImplementor.Run () [0x00008] in /Users/builder/data/lanes/6102/4b951a3e/source/monodroid/external/xamarin-android/src/Mono.Android/Java.Lang/Thread.cs:36   
	at Java.Lang.IRunnableInvoker.n_Run (System.IntPtr jnienv, System.IntPtr native__this) [0x00009] in /Users/builder/data/lanes/6102/4b951a3e/source/monodroid/external/xamarin-android/src/Mono.Android/obj/Release/android-28/mcw/Java.Lang.IRunnable.cs:81   
	at (wrapper dynamic-method) System.Object.60(intptr,intptr)


This stacktrace points to the following code:
https://github.com/xamarin/Xamarin.Forms/blob/4.1.0/Xamarin.Forms.Platform.Android/Platform.cs#L585

It seems that this line of code changed starting in version 4.0.
In this case, the following code throws the nullreference:
CurrentMasterDetailPage.Master.IconImageSource.IsEmpty

This is because CurrentMasterDetailPage.Master.IconImageSource is null if you do not set an IconImageSource for the Master contentpage of a MasterDetailPage.
Setting this property avoids the issue.

I also created this issue for the documentation: https://github.com/MicrosoftDocs/xamarin-docs/issues/1956

### Steps to Reproduce
All pages created in cs, no xaml involved.

1. In App.cs, I set MainPage to a Login page that derives from CarousselPage.
2. If login succesfull, create a MasterDetailPage 
3. The MasterDetailPage has a ContentPage as Master and a NavigationPage as the Detail.
4. The Master ContentPage does not set the IconImageSource, 
5. Set the MasterDetailPage as the MainPage
5. Debug in Android
6. A nullreference happens the moment you assign the MasterDetailPage to the MainPage property and crashes the app.

### Expected Behavior
does not crash when IconImageSource not set.

### Actual Behavior
nullreference
### Basic Information

- Version with issue: 4.0, 4.1
- Last known good version: 3.6
- IDE: Visual studio 2017
- Platform Target Frameworks: 
  - Android: 9.0
- Nuget Packages: Xamarin.Forms
- Affected Devices: HTC10

Events.RelatedDescription: Opened pull request "[xcode11] [Generator] Do not used harcoded 'error' var name, use the one in the declaration." (#6637) at xamarin/xamarin-macios
Merged pull request "[Generator] Do not used harcoded 'error' var name, use the one in the declaration." (#6620) at xamarin/xamarin-macios

Merged pull request "[contacts] xcode11 beta1 - beta4 updated bindings" (#6563) at xamarin/xamarin-macios
Events.RelatedBody:
Apple issue filed for typo: https://feedbackassistant.apple.com/feedback/6623415
Generics issues filed here: https://github.com/xamarin/xamarin-macios/issues/6561#issue-467045824

Generics code:

```
 [Unavailable (PlatformName.Swift)]
 [Export ("enumeratorForContactFetchRequest:error:")]
 [return: NullAllowed]
 CNFetchResult<NSEnumerator<CNContact>> GetEnumeratorForContact (CNContactFetchRequest request, [NullAllowed] out NSError error);

 [Unavailable (PlatformName.Swift)]
 [Export ("enumeratorForChangeHistoryFetchRequest:error:")]
 [return: NullAllowed]
 CNFetchResult<NSEnumerator<CNChangeHistoryEvent>> GetEnumeratorForChangeHistory (CNChangeHistoryFetchRequest request, [NullAllowed] out NSError error);
```
